fields.Work/Exhibit Title: <span style="font-size:14.6667px;">Election Perceptions: Two People, Two Generations, Two Experiences, One Result</span>
fields.Name of Performing Group: Professor Sam Martin and Ethan LaHaug
fields.Description/Abstract: Boise State is putting together a special exhibit for faculty, students and employees to present scholarship, research, and creative content in digital form. During Fall 2024, I worked with one of my students, Ethan, La Haug, to make a video about our perceptions leading up to and on election day. We paid particular attention to the election of the president. Each of us created a narrative about our experience, watching media coverage and what we were thinking as we watched the results come in.
